pr_title: Fix undesirable deployment zone for reinforcements

timeline.message: fix reinforcements always deploying to any

timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't this now generate a random edge to enter from? Do we want it to instead be based on the player's edge as the base?
timeline.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: That's the idea, yes. This is the default template. If someone wants to define a scenario template where the reinforcements come from a fixed position or synchronized with the primary force, they can do so by creating a "Reinforcements" force template within the scenario template, which will override this default template.
replies.author: NickAragua
